item.title: Buildroot and U-boot on Raspberry Pi
item.description: When doing development of the OS, flashing your SD card after every change is not reasonable. Instead, use U-boot to allow booting over the network. In this post I go over configuring Buildroot to build U-boot and configure it for a Raspberry Pi.

item.title: A simpler life without sudo
item.description: Using Linux capabilities(7) to avoid using sudo, and using Capmon to figure out what capbilities are required.
